Html:
Hi there

I have the following problem. When I try to convert a Quickgraph graph to Glee, the string identifiers of each vertex appear as a number in the Glee graph.
For example vertex A appear as 0 in Glee Graph
Is this a known problem?


Thank you
Use the GleeIndentifiableGraphPopulator instead of the GleeDefaultGraphPopulator, it will use the ID as keys in the GLee graph. Otherwize it numbers each vertex with an integer.
Take a look at GleeUtil which contains factory method to create populators.
